TEXT.TITLE: JIM WALTER CORP <JWC> SETS REGULAR PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Qtrly 35 cts vs 35 cts Pay July One Record June 15 Note: payment is based on pre- five-for-four stock split basis, which is to be distributed July 12 to stockholders of record June 15. Reuter
